author: AFP
title: Is Europe beating the virus? Experts urge prudence
description: The initial flood of hospital admissions is starting to slow and infection rates in some countries are flattening. Some are beginning to hope that lockdowns could be eased soon. But experts warn dropping the guard now risks undoing all the sacrifices made and…
content:
Paris: 
Is it the beginning of the end?Even with the death toll still climbing, Europe's home confinement measures to combat the coronavirus appear to be bearing some fruit.
